channel.title: API on ChartMuseum - Helm Chart Repository
channel.description: Recent content in API on ChartMuseum - Helm Chart Repository

item.title: Helm Chart Repository
item.description: GET /index.yaml - retrieved when you run helm repo add chartmuseum http://localhost:8080/ GET /charts/mychart-0.1.0.tgz - retrieved when you run helm install chartmuseum/mychart GET /charts/mychart-0.1.0.tgz.prov - retrieved when you run helm install with the --verify flag

item.title: Chart Manipulation
item.description: POST /api/charts - upload a new chart version POST /api/prov - upload a new provenance file DELETE /api/charts/<name>/<version> - delete a chart version (and corresponding provenance file) GET /api/charts - list all charts GET /api/charts/<name> - list all versions of a chart GET /api/charts/<name>/<version> - describe a chart version

item.title: Server Info
item.description: GET / - HTML welcome page GET /health - returns 200 OK
